content.prompt: Let f be the function given by f ( x ) = 1 ( 2 + x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F58@ . What is the coefficient of x3 in the Taylor series for f about x = 0 ?

topic.text: 10.14: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor or Maclaurin Series for a Function

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
